subject: docs(claude): add commit message format guidelines
body:
Add structured commit message format section to CLAUDE.md under
AI SESSION MANAGEMENT. Defines required metadata footers including
Tags, Complexity, Urgency, Impact, Risk, Debt, Epic, and Semver
fields for every commit.

Tags: docs, process, standards
Complexity: 1
Urgency: 2
Impact: internal
Risk: low
Debt: neutral
Epic: commit-guidelines
Semver: patch

https://claude.ai/code/session_01V2NhhpMQ1osNER3yTh58pA
title: add commit message format guidelines
